resources.string: This app is a companion app to telegram. It allows you to view a group chat as a store to facilitate easy exchange. You must be using the telegram app already to continue
Please enter your phone number starting with the country code
Please enter the access code sent to your existing telegram installation

I designed this app to allow people to better manage their local groups bartering and event planning. You can contact me at @robo_cam on telegram or visit the telegram channel telemarket_buysell for more information.

My normal privacy policy explains tha I have no intention of harvesting or collecting your data but that I can\'t guarantee it\'s security. I think that this is still true with this app. I really like telegram and recommend it to everyone. But in my personal opinion you can\' rely on privacy when using a computer. If your worried about my app vs telegram itself then please feel free to browse github and search cagney moreau to view the code with a brief explanation of how it works.
